title: The economic impact of LLMs
excerpt: A great master must be a great teacher

body.raw: Large language models such as generative pre-trained transformers (GPTs) are in full bloom, with researchers developing, testing, and refining systems with capabilities spanning various domains [[1]](#1). Technological evolution brought these tools to a broader than-ever audience. In a modern office type-setting, it's increasingly normal to see someone interacting with AI tools like ChatGPT. ### References [1] Sparks of Artificial General Intelligence: Early experiments with GPT-4 [2] GPTs are GPTs: An Early Look at the Labor Market Impact Potential of Large Language Models
